assessment_session - Variable in class com.fraudpointer.api.responsewrappers.ResponseAssessmentSession
 
AssessmentSession - Class in com.fraudpointer.api.models
An Assessment Session is the object returned when you call IClient.createAssessmentSession(), which is the first method that you need to call to start interacting with the FraudPointer Server.

When you want to start interaction with FraudPointer Server you need to call IClient.createAssessmentSession().
AssessmentSession() - Constructor for class com.fraudpointer.api.models.AssessmentSession

createAssessmentSession() - Method in interface com.fraudpointer.api.IClient
Communicates with FraudPointer Server and gets back a ready to use AssessmentSession object.This is the first method that you should call.

E

EncryptCreditCard - Class in com.fraudpointer
This is a console application that can be used to encrypt a credit card hash the way Fraudpointer service requires you to do.
EncryptCreditCard() - Constructor for class com.fraudpointer.EncryptCreditCard
 
Event - Class in com.fraudpointer.api.models
Event object groups a set of Data under an Event Type. This whole set, is then associated to an AssessmentSession by calling IClient.appendEventToAssessmentSession(AssessmentSession, Event)

When you are using the FraudPointer Service, you need to collect data and sent it over to FraudPointer Server.
Event(String) - Constructor for class com.fraudpointer.api.models.Event
Instantiate an Event by calling new on this Constructor.

I

IClient - Interface in com.fraudpointer.api
IClient is the interface that each java client should implement in order to be used as a client proxy to access FraudPointer Service.

Profile - Class in com.fraudpointer.api.models

R

RequestKey - Class in com.fraudpointer.api.requestwrappers

RequestKey() - Constructor for class com.fraudpointer.api.requestwrappers.RequestKey
 
RequestKeyAndEvent - Class in com.fraudpointer.api.requestwrappers
Event needs to be wrapped before serialization to json format.This class helps carry out this wrapping.

Note: ClientFactory.construct() method returns an object that implements IClient interface and hides all the complexity of sending to and receiving data from Fraudpointer Server.
RequestKeyAndEvent() - Constructor for class com.fraudpointer.api.requestwrappers.RequestKeyAndEvent
 
RequestKeyAndFraudAssessment - Class in com.fraudpointer.api.requestwrappers

Note: ClientFactory.construct() method returns an object that implements IClient interface and hides all the complexity of sending to and receiving data from Fraudpointer Server.
RequestKeyAndFraudAssessment() - Constructor for class com.fraudpointer.api.requestwrappers.RequestKeyAndFraudAssessment

The Resolution of a Case as set by human (or automatically according to Fraudpointer application configuration).

Note: ClientFactory.construct() method returns an object that implements IClient interface and hides all the complexity of sending to and receiving data from Fraudpointer Server.
